title: handwritten font with alternates
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017055040im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled9_4685.jpg)

haven't seen this one around, looks the part though! Can someone point me in the right direction?

thanks!
author: mike.j

comments.content: Oh, maybe I should clarify: Im looking for the font used in the first two and last two lines on the picture :)

Thought it's some font by [PintassilgoPrints](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017055040/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/PintassilgoPrints) like [Polygraph](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017055040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pintassilgo/polygraph) or [Berimbau](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017055040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pintassilgo/berimbau) but I was wrong... Still looking.
